"""🌙✨ مرحبًا بك في وضع الظلام Shade ✨🌙
🖥️ هل تشعر بالإرهاق من الضوء الساطع للمواقع الإلكترونية؟ حان الوقت لاحتضان أناقة الجانب الداكن مع وضع الظلام Shade! 🌑
🌐 قل وداعاً لإجهاد العين واستمتع بتجربة تصفح سلسة على كل موقع. يحوّل وضع الظلام Shade بسهولة جميع المواقع إلى سمة داكنة مهدئة، ويخلق بيئة مريحة بصريًا لمغامراتك العبر الإنترنت. 🌚
✨ مع وضع الظلام Shade، ستحصل على:
➡️ وضع الظلام مُفعّل لجميع المواقع، مما يمنح تجربة تصفحك لمسة أنيقة وحديثة. 🖤
➡️ تحكم شخصي يسمح لك بتخصيص إعدادات وضع الظلام وفقًا لتفضيلاتك، حتى تتمكن حقًا من جعله يتناسب معك. ✏️
🚫 ولكن ماذا لو كان موقع لا يتوافق جيدًا مع وضع الظلام أو إذا كنت تفضل مظهرًا أكثر إشراقًا؟ لا تقلق! يتيح لك وضع الظلام Shade إدراج مواقع محددة في القائمة السوداء، مما يضمن أن تظل هذه المواقع في الضوء بينما تبقى بقية الويب في الظلام. ⛔
⚡️ قل مرحبًا بالتصفح السهل لوضع الظلام مع وضع الظلام Shade! قم بتحسين تجربتك على الويب اليوم وانضم إلى الجانب الداكن حيث يلتقي الراحة والأناقة. احصل على الامتداد الآن وابدأ التصفح بأناقة. 💻🌙"""

🌙✨ Introducing Shade Dark Mode: Embrace the Elegance of the Dark Side ✨🌙

🖥️ Are you tired of being blinded by the glaring brightness of websites? It's time to immerse yourself in the sleek elegance of the dark side with Shade Dark Mode! 🌑

🌐 Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to a seamless browsing experience on every website. Shade Dark Mode effortlessly transforms all websites into a soothing dark theme, creating a visually comfortable environment for your online adventures. 🌚

✨ With Shade Dark Mode, you will experience a revolution in web browsing:
➡️ Dark mode enabled for ALL websites, giving your browsing experience a sleek and modern touch. 🖤
➡️ Personalized controls that allow you to customize the dark mode settings according to your preferences, so you can truly make it your own. ✏️

🚫 But what if a website doesn't play nicely with dark mode or if you simply prefer a lighter look? No worries! Shade Dark Mode offers you the ability to blacklist specific websites, ensuring they stay in the light while the rest of the web stays in the dark. ⛔

⚡️ Say hello to effortless dark mode browsing with Shade Dark Mode! Upgrade your web experience today and join the dark side, where comfort and style meet. Get the extension now and start browsing with flair. 💻🌙

💡 Key Features of Shade Dark Mode:
1️⃣ Seamlessly enables dark mode for all websites, creating a modern and visually appealing browsing experience.
2️⃣ Personalize the dark mode settings to suit your preferences, allowing you to fine-tune your browsing environment.
3️⃣ Blacklist specific websites that don't play well with dark mode or simply prefer a lighter look.
4️⃣ Enhance your browsing experience with a sleek and elegant design that reduces eye strain and provides visual comfort.
5️⃣ Effortlessly toggle between dark and light modes with just a click, allowing you to adapt to different environments and moods.
6️⃣ Experience improved readability and reduced glare, making it easier to focus on the content you love.
7️⃣ Seamlessly integrate Shade Dark Mode into your browsing routine, enhancing your productivity and enjoyment.
8️⃣ Enjoy a consistent dark mode experience across all websites, creating a cohesive and immersive browsing experience.
9️⃣ Stay up-to-date with frequent updates and improvements, ensuring you always have the best dark mode experience.
🔟 Join a community of dark mode enthusiasts and discover new ways to enhance your browsing experience.

💫 Upgrade your web experience today and immerse yourself in the world of Shade Dark Mode. Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to a visually comfortable and stylish browsing adventure. Embrace the dark side now and start browsing with flair. 💻🌙

"""🌙✨ እንኳን ወደ Shade Dark Mode እንዴት መጣህ ✨🌙
🖥️ በድረ-ገፅ የሚያስቀመጥ ቆይታዎች የሚታየውን በየቀኑ የሚያሳይ የቅጣት መስጫዎችን ለ Shade Dark Mode ስሜት ይቀየር! 🌑
🌐 እንዴት ሆነህ ለማንበብ ሳይረሳሽም እና ለማስታወቂያ በማድረግ በመስጫዎች ላይ የሚያስቀምጥ በተለይ ጥቅም ስሜት ይቀየር! Shade Dark Mode የሚሰጥ ቀለም የማይገናኝ የሚታየውን የቅጣት መስጫዎችን የሚያስቀምጥ በአስተዳደር ምስጢር የሚያገኙትን ለመከላከል ይህንን የሚያስተባብሩ ለማስታወቂያዎች ይቀየርልን ይሆናል። 🌚
✨ Shade Dark Mode በቀለም የሚያስቀምጥ የማይገናኝ ቅጣት ለሁሉም የድረ-ገፅ ምስጢር በቀኑ የሚያስተላልፍ ማንበብ ይሁን. 🖤
✏️ በምስጢር ቅጣት ለማድረግ የሚታየውን ቀለም ማስታወቂያዎች የሚያስቀምጥ ሰነዶች ለማስተባብሩ ይቀየርልን እንዴት ማድረግ ይችላል። ምስጢርዎን በተለይም ይጠቀሙ ። ✏️
🚫 ጥቅም ጥቅም ማድረግ ከተሳካ ስሜት ወይም ከእውነት በአንድ ቀን መታወቂያዎችን እንዴት ያስቀምጥ? የሚያነቡ! Shade Dark Mode የሚያስተላልፉ የድረ-ገፅ ምስጢርን የሚያገኙትን በተለይ በቀኑ የሚሰጡትን ትክክለኛ ምስጢር ይቀየር እንዴት ማድረግ ይችላል። ⛔
⚡️ ለ Shade Dark Mode በተለይ የሚጠቀሙ የማይገናኝ ትክክለኛ ምስጢር የሚያስተላልፉ የድረ-ገፅ ምስጢርን ይቀየርልን! የሁሉም የድረ-ገፅ ምስጢርን ለማስተላልፉ ያድርጉት እና የተለያዩ ድረ-ገፅ እንዴት ማስታወቂያዎችን ያግኙበታል። 💻🌙"""

🚫 でも、もしウェブサイトがダークモードに対応していなかったり、明るい雰囲気を好む場合はどうでしょう？心配ありません！シェードダークモードでは、特定のウェブサイトをブラックリストに登録することができます。そうすれば、それらのウェブサイトは明るいままで、他のウェブはダークなままになります。⛔
⚡️ シェードダークモードで簡単なダークモードブラウジングをご体験ください！ウェブ体験をアップグレードし、快適さとスタイルが融合するダークサイドに参加しましょう。エクステンションを今すぐ入手して、個性的なブラウジングを始めましょう。💻🌙」

"🌙✨ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ಶೇಡ್ ಗೆ ಸ್ವಾಗತ! ✨🌙
🖥️ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳ ಬೆಳಕಿನ ಬೆಳಕಿನಿಂದ ಬೆರಗಾಗುವುದರಿಂದ ಬಿದ್ದುಹೋಗಿದ್ದೀರಾ? ಇದು ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಸೈಡ್‌ನ ಅದ್ಭುತ ನೈಪುಣ್ಯವನ್ನು ಸ್ವೀಕರಿಸುವ ಸಮಯ! 🌑
🌐 ಕಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಹಾನಿಯನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡಲು ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರತಿ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಸುಗಮವಾದ ಬ್ರೌಸಿಂಗ್ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಲು ಶೇಡ್ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ಎಲ್ಲ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಸೌಂದರ್ಯಕರ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಥೀಮ್ ಗೆ ಆನಂದದಾಯಕವಾಗಿ ಪರಿವರ್ತಿಸುತ್ತದೆ. 🌚
✨ ಶೇಡ್ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ, ನೀವು ಪಡೆಯುವುದು:
➡️ ಎಲ್ಲ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳಿಗೆ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ಸಿಗುವಂತೆ ಮಾಡುವುದು, ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬ್ರೌಸಿಂಗ್ ಅನುಭವಕ್ಕೆ ಒಂದು ನವೀನ ಮುದ್ರೆ ನೀಡುತ್ತದೆ. 🖤
➡️ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಆದಾಯಕ್ಕೆ ಅನುಗುಣವಾಗಿ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ಸೆಟ್ಟಿಂಗ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಗೊಳಿಸಲು ಅನುಮತಿಸುವ ನಿಮ್ಮ ನಿಯಂತ್ರಣಗಳು, ನೀವು ನಿಜವಾಗಿ ಅದನ್ನು ನಿಮ್ಮದೇ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು. ✏️
🚫 ಆದರೆ ಒಂದು ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಸರಿಯಾಗಿ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡುವುದಿಲ್ಲವಾದರೆ ಅಥವಾ ನೀವು ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಹಾಲು ಹೇಗೆ ಇದೆಯೆಂದು ಇಷ್ಟಪಡುವುದಾದರೆ? ಆಶ್ಚರ್ಯವಿಲ್ಲ! ಶೇಡ್ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ನಿಮ್ಮನ್ನು ಕೆಲವು ನಿರ್ದಿಷ್ಟ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಕಪ್ಪೆಯಾಗಿ ಹೊಂದಿಸುತ್ತದೆ, ಇತರ ವೆಬ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಕಪ್ಪೆಯಾಗಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ⛔
⚡️ ಶೇಡ್ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಅಲ್ಲಿ ಇರುವ ಬ್ರೌಸಿಂಗ್‌ನ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ ಮೋಡ್ ಬ್ರೌಸಿಂಗ್ ಸಹಜವಾಗಿ ಮಾಡಲು ಹೇಳಿ! ನಿಮ್ಮ ವೆಬ್ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ಇಂದು ಮೆಲುಕುಗೊಳಿಸಿ ನಿಮ್ಮನ್ನು ಕರೆದು ಹಾಕಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ. 💻🌙"

🌙✨ Introducing Shade Darkreader: Embrace the Elegance of the Dark Side ✨🌙

🖥️ Are you tired of being blinded by the bright light of websites? It's time to immerse yourself in the sleek elegance of the dark side with Shade Darkreader! 🌑

🌐 Say goodbye to eye strain and welcome a seamless browsing experience on every website. Shade Darkreader effortlessly transforms all websites into a soothing dark theme, creating a visually comfortable environment for your online adventures. 🌚

✨ With Shade Darkreader, you get an array of incredible features:

➡️ Enabled Dark Mode for ALL websites, giving your browsing experience a sleek and modern touch. Experience the web in a whole new light, or rather, darkness! 🖤

➡️ Personalized controls that allow you to customize the Dark Mode settings according to your preferences. Tailor it to your own unique style and make browsing a true reflection of your personality. ✏️

🚫 But what if a website doesn't play nicely with Dark Mode, or if you simply prefer a lighter look? No worries! Shade Darkreader empowers you to blacklist specific websites, ensuring they stay in the light while the rest of the web revels in darkness. ⛔

⚡️ Say hello to effortless Dark Mode browsing with Shade Darkreader! Upgrade your web experience today and join the dark side, where comfort and style converge. Get the extension now and start browsing with flair. 💻🌙

Shade Darkreader is the ultimate companion for those seeking a visually comfortable online journey. Dive into a world where websites are no longer blinding, but rather a soothing haven for your eyes. Experience the web like never before, with a touch of elegance and a dash of sophistication.

Immerse yourself in the dark side and discover a new level of browsing pleasure. Whether you're working late into the night or simply prefer a more relaxed browsing experience, Shade Darkreader has got you covered.

With its seamless integration, Shade Darkreader effortlessly applies Dark Mode to every website you visit. Embrace the modern and chic aesthetic, as your favorite websites transform into a visually stunning experience.

But we understand that everyone has their own unique preferences. That's why Shade Darkreader allows you to personalize your Dark Mode settings. Adjust the contrast, hue, and brightness to suit your individual taste and create the perfect atmosphere for your online adventures.

And if you ever come across a website that simply doesn't play nicely with Dark Mode, Shade Darkreader has the solution. Blacklist those websites and let them bask in the light while you enjoy the soothing darkness everywhere else.

Upgrade your web experience today and join the legion of Shade Darkreader users who have unlocked the true potential of browsing in style. Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to a world of elegance, comfort, and sophistication.

Get the Shade Darkreader extension now and embark on a journey where the dark side meets your personal style. Embrace the sleek elegance of Dark Mode and start browsing with flair. Your eyes deserve it! 💻🌙

"""🌙✨ ഷേഡ് ഡാർക്ക് മോഡ്‌ക്ക് സ്വാഗതം ✨🌙
🖥️ വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളുടെ പ്രകാശം കാണുന്നതിനാൽ മൂക്കിലായിരിക്കാനുള്ള പ്രശ്നങ്ങൾ തേടാൻ വിസമ്മതിക്കുന്നുണ്ടോ? ഷേഡ് ഡാർക്ക് മോഡിന്റെ സൗകര്യങ്ങൾ അടിസ്ഥാനമാക്കിയാൽ ഇനി നിങ്ങൾ തന്നെ ഒരു മോഡേൻ അനുഭവം അനുഭവിക്കാൻ സമയമായിരിക്കും! 🌑
🌐 നേരിട്ട് എല്ലാ വെബ്സൈറ്റുകളിലേക്കുള്ള ബ്രൗസിംഗ് അനുഭവത്തിന് കണ്ടെത്താൻ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് കഴിയും ആരാധകമായ ഒരു ഡാർക്ക് തീം സൃഷ്ടിക്കുന്ന ഷേഡ് ഡാർക്ക് മോഡ് സൗകര്യം എന്നിവയാണ്. ഇത് നിങ്ങളുടെ ഓൺലൈന്‍ അപ്രവചനീയ പ്രവർത്തനങ്ങളിലേക്ക് വിവരമായ ഒരു സന്തുഷ്ടിദായക പരിസ്ഥിതി സൃഷ്ടിക്കുന്നു. 🌚
✨ ഷേഡ് ഡാർക്ക് മോഡിനോട് നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ലഭിക്കുന്നത്:

➡️ നിങ്ങളുടെ പ്രാധാന്യങ്ങളുടെ പ്രകാരം ഡാർക്ക് മോഡ് ക്രമീകരിക്കാൻ നിങ്ങളുടെ വ്യക്തിപരമായ നിയന്ത്രണങ്ങൾ ലഭിക്കുന്നു, അതിനാൽ അത് നിങ്ങളുടെയാക്കാം. ✏️

🖥️ Chán ngấy vì ánh sáng chói lóa của các trang web? Đến lúc đón nhận sự thanh lịch mượt mà từ phía tối tăm với Chế Độ Tối Bóng Bảy! 🌑
🌐 Nói lời tạm biệt với căng thẳng mắt và chào đón một trải nghiệm duyệt web liền mạch trên mọi trang web. Chế Độ Tối Bóng Bảy dễ dàng biến tất cả các trang web thành một chủ đề tối tắt mắt, tạo ra một môi trường thoải mái hình ảnh cho cuộc phiêu lưu trực tuyến của bạn. 🌚
✨ Với Chế Độ Tối Bóng Bảy, bạn sẽ nhận được:
➡️ Chế độ tối được bật cho TẤT CẢ các trang web, mang đến cho trải nghiệm duyệt web của bạn một cảm giác mượt mà và hiện đại. 🖤
➡️ Kiểm soát cá nhân cho phép bạn tùy chỉnh các thiết lập chế độ tối theo sở thích của bạn, để bạn thực sự làm cho nó trở thành của riêng mình. ✏️
🚫 Nhưng nếu một trang web không tương thích với chế độ tối hoặc nếu bạn đơn giản chỉ thích giao diện sáng hơn? Đừng lo! Chế Độ Tối Bóng Bảy cho phép bạn đưa vào danh sách đen các trang web cụ thể, đảm bảo rằng chúng sẽ vẫn ở ánh sáng trong khi phần còn lại của web vẫn giữ ở bóng tối. ⛔
⚡️ Xin chào với việc duyệt web chế độ tối một cách dễ dàng với Chế Độ Tối Bóng Bảy! Nâng cấp trải nghiệm web của bạn ngay hôm nay và tham gia phía tối tăm, nơi sự thoải mái và phong cách gặp nhau. Tải ngay tiện ích mở rộng và bắt đầu duyệt web với phong cách. 💻🌙
long.zh_CN:
🌙✨ Welcome to Shade Dark Mode ✨🌙
🖥️ Tired of being blinded by the bright light of websites? It's time to embrace the sleek elegance of the dark side with Shade Dark Mode! 🌑
🌐 Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to a seamless browsing experience on every website. Shade Dark Mode effortlessly transforms all websites into a soothing dark theme, creating a visually comfortable environment for your online adventures. 🌚
✨ With Shade Dark Mode, you get:
➡️ Enabled dark mode for ALL websites, giving your browsing experience a sleek and modern touch. 🖤
➡️ Personalized controls that let you customize the dark mode settings according to your preferences, so you can truly make it your own. ✏️
🚫 But what if a website doesn't play nicely with dark mode or if you simply prefer a lighter look? No worries! Shade Dark Mode allows you to blacklist specific websites, ensuring they stay in the light while the rest of the web stays in the dark. ⛔
⚡️ Say hello to effortless dark mode browsing with Shade Dark Mode! Upgrade your web experience today and join the dark side, where comfort and style meet. Get the extension now and start browsing with flair. 💻🌙

🌙✨ 欢迎来到阴暗模式 ✨🌙
🖥️ 厌倦了被网站明亮的光线刺眼吗？现在是时候拥抱阴暗面的优雅，体验阴暗模式的魅力了！🌑
🌐 告别眼部疲劳，享受每个网站的无缝浏览体验吧。阴暗模式轻松将所有网站转换为舒缓的黑暗主题，为您的在线冒险创造一个视觉舒适的环境。🌚
✨ 有了阴暗模式，您将获得：
➡️ 为所有网站启用阴暗模式，为您的浏览体验增添时尚和现代感。🖤
➡️ 个性化控制，让您根据自己的偏好自定义阴暗模式设置，让它真正成为您的专属风格。✏️
🚫 但是，如果某个网站不支持阴暗模式或者您只是更喜欢浅色外观怎么办？别担心！阴暗模式允许您将特定网站加入黑名单，确保它们保持明亮，而其他网站则保持黑暗。⛔
⚡️ 与阴暗模式一起享受轻松的黑暗模式浏览吧！立即升级您的网络体验，加入舒适和时尚的阴暗面。现在就获取扩展并开始以别样的风格浏览。💻🌙

🖥️ 厭倦了被網站明亮的光線刺眼嗎？是時候擁抱陰暗面的優雅光輝，使用陰影黑暗模式！🌑

⚡️ 與陰影黑暗模式一起輕鬆瀏覽黑暗模式！立即升級您的網頁體驗，加入舒適與時尚相遇的黑暗面。立即獲取擴展程式，開始以風格瀏覽網頁。💻🌙
